CATEGORY_ERROR00.errorDetails: Please contact Dev Team, unknown Error occurred

CATEGORY_ERROR01.errorDetails: The Category ID doesn't exist within our system, please check your ID.

CATEGORY_ERROR02.errorDetails: Please choose another name for your category, this name is already in use.

CATEGORY_ERROR03.errorDetails: You are missing some parameters in the request, PARAM EXAMPLE {'name':'Compressors','categoryImg_File':{'name':'CategoryImg','extension':'jpg','size':100,'fileBinary':'SGVsbG8sIFdvcmxkIQ=='}}

CATEGORY_ERROR04.errorDetails: You are missing some parameters in the request, PARAM EXAMPLE {'id':'6509a40064bd1a2b882ad7be','name':'Compressors','categoryImg_File':{'name':'CategoryImg','extension':'jpg','size':100,'fileBinary':'SGVsbG8sIFdvcmxkIQ=='}} NOTE, if you don't wanna change the img, just leave it with empty 'categoryImg_File':{}

CATEGORY_ERROR05.errorDetails: The Sub-Category ID doesn't exist within our system, please check your ID.

CATEGORY_ERROR06.errorDetails: Please choose another name for your Sub-category, this name is already in use.

CATEGORY_ERROR07.errorDetails: You are missing some parameters in the request, PARAM EXAMPLE {'name':'Size','categoryId':'6509a88e55a524552531dc2f'}

CATEGORY_ERROR08.errorDetails: You are missing some parameters in the request, PARAM EXAMPLE {'id':'6509c51dd738c2007f7b56f0','name':'Width','categoryId':'6509bb79d65b8a3fbd994ffa'}

CATEGORY_ERROR09.errorDetails: The Sub-CategoryValue ID doesn't exist within our system, please check your ID.

CATEGORY_ERROR010.errorDetails: Please choose another Value for your Sub-categoryValue, this value is already in use.

CATEGORY_ERROR011.errorDetails: You are missing some parameters in the request, PARAM EXAMPLE {'subCategoryId':'6509c529d738c2007f7b56f1','value':'5CV'}

CATEGORY_ERROR012.errorDetails: You are missing some parameters in the request, PARAM EXAMPLE {'id':'6509cd2bb3a81866d787a531','value':'5CV','subCategoryId':'6509c529d738c2007f7b56f10'}
